mapper.insert: insert into members (user_name, user_id, user_password, email_id, email_domain, join_date) values (#{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, now())
mapper.update: update members set user_name=#{userName}, user_password=#{userPwd}, email_id=#{emailId}, email_domain=#{emailDomain} where user_id=#{userId}
